text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-v3-ReactionParticipant-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType4.0.0  CATcatalyst

The catalyst of a chemical reaction, such as an enzyme or a platinum surface. In biochemical reactions, connects the enzyme with the molecular interaction

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType4.0.0  CSMconsumable

Participant material that is taken up, diminished, altered, or disappears in the act.

http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType4.0.0  PRDproduct

Participant material that is brought forth (produced) in the act (e.g., specimen in a specimen collection, access or drainage in a placement service, medication package in a dispense service). It does not matter whether the material produced had existence prior to the service, or whether it is created in the service (e.g., in supply services the product is taken from a stock).

name: R5V3ReactionParticipantForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.ReactionParticipant for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ReactionParticipant|2.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:

value set `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ReactionParticipant|2.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.
